Description:
Using your many arms, you send a barrage of balls of furious energy at any creature(s) in range. Each ball automatically deals 1d6 dark damage to any creature(s) you choose. Reactions that negate damage such as Protect or Detect cannot be used. After activating this move, any attacks against you, until the beginning of your next turn, are rolled at advantage.

Balls per level:
From level 1 to 4: 3 balls
From level 5 to 9: 4 balls
From level 10 to 16: 5 balls
From level 17 to 20: 6 balls
Scaling: Higher Levels: You can fire 4 projectiles at level 5, 5 projectiles at level 10, and 6 projectiles at level 17.
